title: Slovenia at the 2004 Summer Paralympics
text:
Slovenia competed at the <a href="2004%20Summer%20Paralympics">2004 Summer Paralympics</a> in <a href="Athens">Athens</a>, Greece. The team included 28 athletes, 14 men and 14 women. Competitors from Slovenia won 4 medals, including 1 gold, 2 silver and 1 bronze to finish 49th in the <a href="2004%20Summer%20Paralympics%20medal%20table">medal table</a>.
Sports.
Goalball.
The men's goalball team didn't win any medals; they were 11th out of 12 teams.
Volleyball.
The women's volleyball team didn't win any medals; they were defeated by the <a href="United%20States%20at%20the%202004%20Summer%20Paralympics">United States</a> in the bronze medal match.
